When Annie begins a steamy affair with seductive con man Brent, he uses his 
charm to convince her to murder her husband and split the inheritance. But 
when Brent squanders the money and starts sleeping around with other women, 
Annie packs up and leaves him. By the time Brent finds her again, she's happily 
married to Richard, a wealthy real estate heir. Will Brent succeed in convincing 
Annie to repeat the deadly scam? Watch and find out!
